author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unilever Says Received Binding Offer From Dr.Oetker To Acquire Alsa Baking And Dessert Preparation Business​
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Unilever Nv:
* ‍UNILEVER HAS RECEIVED A BINDING OFFER FROM DR.OETKER TO ACQUIRE ALSA BAKING AND DESSERT PREPARATION BUSINESS​
* ‍TRANSACTION WOULD INCLUDE MANUFACTURING UNIT IN LUDRES, FRANCE​
* ‍HAS RECEIVED BINDING OFFER FOR PURCHASE OF ALSA BAKING AND DESSERT BUSINESS FROM DR. OETKER FOR AN UNDISCLOSED AMOUNT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
